summary: For once, pop psychology gets it right.  We are doing the best we can do with what we have to work with
title: Doing the Best We Can

summary:
Carol Surface is out as the Chief People Officer at Apple.  It was less than two years ago when I commented on Chance Miller’s post about her joining the executive team:

I’m a bit surprised to see Apple hire an “outsider” for this high-profile role.  I thought they had learned their lesson last time...
title: Chief People Officer Left the Chat

summary: It's been a while that I don't post here, whoops.  I haven't done any tech projects lately (other than tinkering with CSS for my main blog), but I have been keeping afloat at work.  Without going into too much detail, I really need to think about what I want to do next after this gig is up, voluntarily or not...
title: Cybersecurity, Perhaps?
